Deprecated API

  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.bitcoinj.core.listeners.AbstractPeerDataEventListener
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction.MIN_NONDUST_OUTPUT
    use TransactionOutput.getMinNonDustValue()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction.SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY_VALUE
    Instead use SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.value or SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.byteValue() as appropriate.
    org.bitcoinj.core.VarInt.value
    use {VarInt.intValue() or {VarInt.longValue()}}
    org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptOpCodes.OP_NOP2
    org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptOpCodes.OP_NOP3
    org.bitcoinj.uri.BitcoinURI.BITCOIN_SCHEME
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.bitcoinj.core.Bech32.encode​(String, byte[])
    use Bech32.encode(Encoding, String, byte[])
    org.bitcoinj.core.Block.getBlockInflation​(int)
    Use AbstractBitcoinNetParams.getBlockInflation(int)
    org.bitcoinj.core.ECKey.compressPoint​(LazyECPoint)
    Use LazyECPoint.compress()
    org.bitcoinj.core.ECKey.decompressPoint​(LazyECPoint)
    Use LazyECPoint.decompress()

    use TransactionOutput.getMinNonDustValue()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Peer.toStringServices​(long)
    org.bitcoinj.core.PeerGroup.getMemoryPool()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction.getHash()
    use Transaction.getTxId()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction.getHashAsString()
    use Transaction.getTxId().toString()
    org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput.getAddressFromP2PKHScript​(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput.getAddressFromP2SH​(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey.serializePrivate​(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey.serializePublic​(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.HDUtils.append​(List<ChildNumber>, ChildNumber)
    Use HDPath#extend
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.HDUtils.concat​(List<ChildNumber>, List<ChildNumber>)
    Use HDPath#extend
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.HDUtils.formatPath​(List<ChildNumber>)
    Use HDPath#toString
    org.bitcoinj.crypto.HDUtils.parsePath​(String)
    Use HDPath.parsePath
    org.bitcoinj.params.AbstractBitcoinNetParams.getMinNonDustOutput()
    use TransactionOutput.getMinNonDustValue()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.correctlySpends​(Transaction, long, Script, Set<Script.VerifyFlag>)
    Use Script.correctlySpends(Transaction, int, TransactionWitness, Coin, Script, Set) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.executeScript​(Transaction, long, Script, LinkedList<byte[]>, boolean)
    Use Script.executeScript(Transaction, long, Script, LinkedList, Set) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isOpReturn()
    use ScriptPattern.isOpReturn(Script)
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isPayToScriptHash()
    use ScriptPattern.isP2SH(Script)
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToAddress()
    use ScriptPattern.isP2PKH(Script)
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToMultiSig()
    use ScriptPattern.isSentToMultisig(Script)
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToRawPubKey()
    use ScriptPattern.isP2PK(Script)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Key.OutputScriptType.valueOf​(int)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Key.Type.valueOf​(int)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Transaction.Pool.valueOf​(int)

    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Protos.Wallet.EncryptionType.valueOf​(int)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.findKeyFromPubHash​(byte[])
    Use Wallet.findKeyFromPubKeyHash(byte[], ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromKeys​(NetworkParameters, List<ECKey>)
    Use Wallet.createBasic(NetworkParameters), then Wallet.importKeys(List).
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromSeed​(NetworkParameters, DeterministicSeed)
    Use Wallet.fromSeed(NetworkParameters, DeterministicSeed, ScriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromSpendingKey​(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey)
    Use Wallet.fromSpendingKey(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey, ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.fromWatchingKey​(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey)
    Use Wallet.fromWatchingKey(NetworkParameters, DeterministicKey, ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.isDeterministicUpgradeRequired()
    Use Wallet.isDeterministicUpgradeRequired(ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.isPubKeyHashMine​(byte[])
    Use Wallet.isPubKeyHashMine(byte[], ScriptType)
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.toString​(boolean, boolean, boolean, AbstractBlockChain)
    Use Wallet.toString(boolean, boolean, KeyParameter, boolean, boolean, AbstractBlockChain) instead.
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet.upgradeToDeterministic​(KeyParameter)
    Use Wallet.upgradeToDeterministic(ScriptType, KeyParameter)

    Use ChildMessage(NetworkParameters) instead.

    org.bitcoinj.wallet.Wallet​(Context)
    Use Wallet.createDeterministic(Context, ScriptType)
